title: Eric Rauchway on the Great Depresson and the New Deal
description: Eric Rauchway of the University of California at Davis and the author of The Great Depression and the New Deal: A Very Short Introduction, talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the 1920s and the lead-up to the Great Depression, Hoover's policies, and the New Deal. They discuss which policies remained after the recovery and what we might learn today from the policies of the past.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)

They discuss which policies remained after the recovery and what we might learn today from the policies of the past.
